activities.loc: Waushara Co. Courthouse 2nd Floor Room 215, Branch 2

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leonardo-Josue Cruz-Benavidez

defendant.name: Cruz-Benavidez, Leonardo-Josue
defendant.address: W1776 Aspen Ave, Pine River, WI 54965

records.addlTxt: Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician in the manner in which they were prescribed.

Case called @ 3:48 PM Defendant Leonardo-Josue Cruz-Benavidez in court, in custody.  Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Morgan Rae in Court on behalf of Leonardo-Josue Cruz-Benavidez. Enrique Soria in court to interpret. Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and potential punishment.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel. Defendant will not be eligible for SPD services if released from custody. Bond argument by DA Leusink. Bond argument by Atty Rae. Court orders $3000 Cash Bond. IA Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.
Initial appearance scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Initial appearance on November 8, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

Case called @ 1:14 PM Attorney Matthew R. Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. The Court has reviewed the criminal complaint filed today and does find probable cause. Defendant will be seen for a bond hearing on 10/11/2022 at 3:45.
